title: University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Congratulations to the graduating Class of 2020 More
Joining a network of more than 285,000 UIC proud alumni.
Helping to meet the growing need for health care workers.
Illinois’ only University ranked ‘Best Value’ in the nation (#8)

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, we are continuing to accept first-year and transfer applications for Fall 2020.  Considering staying closer to home this Fall?  Look no further than Illinois’ ‘Best Value’ University as named by the Wall Street Journal.
Although I do not know if there is a cure for every disease, I know we simply must work hard to find it.
You ought to be sure to celebrate this accomplishment because it is something you’re going to remember for the rest of your lives.

The University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC), in the heart of the city, provides an affordable and excellent education. Our world-class research benefits individuals and society. Sixteen colleges offer degrees that are valued by employers and will improve our world.
UIC includes a leading health sciences system.

The University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC), in the heart of the city, provides an affordable and excellent education. Our world-class research benefits individuals and society. Sixteen colleges offer degrees that are valued by employers and will improve our world.
UIC includes a leading health sciences system.
UIC is one of the nation’s most ethnically and culturally rich college campuses in America.  Our welcoming environment and diverse student body deepen understanding and intellectual achievement.
Hundreds of on-campus organizations add to student engagement and student success.

All human advancement begins with an idea. Ideas change the world. And at UIC, ideas abound! Come join us. Come share your ideas.
